entry.name: datasource
entry.label: The data to request from the web service (a site code, a set of request arguments, or a fully formed request url).

entry.name: datapolling
entry.label: The update interval (in minutes). The minimum interval is 15minutes. Please consider using a larger interval such as an hour. Most data sources take readings every 15 minutes but updates from the web service occur no more than once an hour.
